title: ¤¤> Expert Outreach Specialist (Link Builder) • Boost Authority & Traffic • 20+ Bonuses & Perks <¤¤
job_overview:
The Outreach Specialist reports directly to the Outreach Manager and provides outreach services to qualifying websites in order to establish a connection between our web properties and theirs. In this role, you will conduct competitive research and backlink analysis, identify new linking partners and establish relationships with web admins via email outreach. Attention to detail is necessary, as we constantly communicate with notable sources. 

Responsibilities
Identify backlink opportunities and perform necessary outreach
Reach out to bloggers and website owners and acquire guest post placements 
Assign article topics to our editorial team
Ideate new content ideas based on the competitive landscape and gaps in the client’s current offerings
Qualify websites for potential link opportunities
Develop and execute a strategy to acquire backlinks to impact organic search visibility positively.
Analyze and ensure a healthy backlink profile
Analyze competitor backlinks
Knowledge of Guest Posting and resource Link Building strategies
Knowledge of tools: Majestic, SEMRUSH, AHREFS, MOZ, Buzzstream
Other duties as assigned

Work Schedule: 12:00mn to 8:30am PH Time

***The company uses a time tracker and maintains a virtual office setup via Google Meet.

Interested applicants may send their resume to Upgrade to see actual info

Thank you!

(Note: DO NOT SEND YOUR APPLICATION through our websites or social media platforms. FAILURE TO COMPLY WITH THIS INSTRUCTION may result in DISQUALIFICATION)
